name: Writer's Block
description:
Writer's Block is an atmospheric, story-driven horror game. The game is being built in GameMaker 2D and features a primarily pixel-art visual theme. 

You play a washed up writer who has difficulties completing written works that he is proud of and constantly struggles with feeling inferior and overshadowed by the his famous and successful best friend. As he struggles to find words of substance, he begins to fall between layers of delusions, visions, and straight-up nightmare scenarios where he is chased by the fears of his past - and they're catching up.

The completed demo is now out and playable! Download it here!
